title: Does wearing Fitbit to bed affect your sleep? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. I didn’t notice anything. I normally don’t sleep well, but after a couple of days I didn’t notice it. You should disable the feature that turns on the screen when you raise your arm - they added this in an update and I kept getting woken up by the light. You also need a comfortable band. Something that doesn’t pinch in any position. I use one of the milanese loop bands - metal mesh with a magnetic clamp. But you need to find something that works for you.
